title: Generating Prime Numbers
text:
import numpy as np

prime_list = [2, 3]
number = 3
counter = 2


while counter < 1000:
    number += 2
    prime = True
    for i in prime_list:
        if i > np.sqrt(number):
            break
        elif number % i == 0:
            prime = False
            break

    if prime == True:
        counter += 1
        prime_list.append(number)

print("The", counter, "th prime number is", number)

The 1000 th prime number is 7919
